game.name: Airship Killer
game.shortDescription: 비행선 킬러는 당신이 당신의 조국을 위협하는 적군을 파괴하는 비행기를 제어하는 흥미로운 차원 사수입니다. 전술을 사용하여 보너스와 응급 처치 키트를 수집하고 어려운 레벨을 완료하고 적을 파괴하십시오!
game.shortDescriptionEn: airplane killer - We only dream of peace - the enemies are preparing a treacherous attack on your homeland, which you simply cannot forgive them. Without thinking of anything better how to accept an unequal battle, you get on your plane and go to the enemy's lair to destroy it once and for all!

reviewHighlights.text: Cool game, weighs only 50 MB, it is easy to play and not boring
Feel like a pilot of a curtain fighter! Nice graphics, you don't get tired of the game. We destroy thousands of enemy aircraft and gain points! Attent...
